title: Dealmaster: Lenovo deals, sales on charging solutions, and more
content:
Today's Dealmaster ranges from Lenovo laptops to Lego toys. As we head into the holiday shopping season, our list of deals includes popular tech favorites like Anker chargers, Apple AirTag trackers, LG OLED TVs, andÂ  Lenovo mobile workstations. Or, for a fun and whimsical gift, check out Lego's Advent calendar to unwrap a small surprise each day.
